reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service, very friendly and helpful staff! I love the products at this store and some stuff can be surprisingly cheap especially when on sale! I definitely will be planning on going back as there is a wonderful selection of stuff to buy and good staff members there who are helpful!

I enjoy shopping here immensely. Especially around the holidays, very exciting for me. I love how they have everything arranged, very easy to find what you are looking for. I cant wait until Halloween to go shopping for stuff or Christmas time, they always have beautiful displays. I love the lights and just about anything you can think of they have it all. Just beautiful.

This is by far the best spot for anything automobile related. What truly sets this Canadian Tire apart, however, is their commitment to customer satisfaction. The entire team always go above and beyond to answer any questions or concerns and ultimately, to make sure your leave their facility with a smile on your face. The technicians always deliver high-quality work promptly, and their commitment to customer satisfaction is unparalleled. Keep up the great work!

Has to check it out, as it was much more than the name leads you to believe. They have a deep and wide variety of items from  aisles and aisles of camping gear to electronics and upstairs was almost all Christmas decorations.  Very cool store

5 stars for their impressive inventory tracking system. Asked a staff member about a heater in early summer, an off-season product, & the guy looked on his phone & knew exactly what high shelf it was on. Rolled a mechanized elevating machine to the right aisle that lifted him to the top shelf & he found the item in an instant. Website accesses same database & seems to be reliably up to date on what is physically in the store & what has to be ordered from someplace else.

A big thank you to Dustin (manager of the fishing dept) for the assistance over the last few days on my spinning reel. He was able to solve the issue right away on the line and I couldnt be more thankful. Thanks again Dustin for all your hard work.

Great place for all your house hold needs! They usually have some great deals as well. It can be a bit confusing finding things in the aisles as its such a big store but they do have item locator screens around the store. I recommend getting their triangle reward card and MasterCard as you tend to accumulate points faster and able to redeem quicker.

It was a great service with Canadian tire center! We had a nail on one of our rear tire. We went to costco, bigotire and Mr. lube to get opinions. We were told that we had to replace all 4 tires without even checking. But we just replace a brand new front tire a year ago and only drove less than 3000 Km since. Costco was the worst of all! They were so impatience and told us they had to replace all four tires because they had to be the same brands because they did not carry my tires brand. Their attitude was the worst!  Canadian tire was our last store to get opinion on.  Gensis, Nash and Steven were very helpful and Gensis was very patience with us. He explained a lot of things to us and help us understand the situation. After listening to our story, Gensis told us that they would first check if our tire was repairable then offered options if it was not.  Both Costco and Mr. Lube never even bothered to do what Canadian tire did. They just assumed that we had a nail and all our four tires were needed to be replaced. Gensis at Canadian tire is such a nice guy and a great supervisor/manager I assumed. He went an extra mile for the customer and put our best interest first! As a business owner myself, I really think it is hard to find a great employee like Gensis these days.  In the end, it turned out to be that our tire only needed a patch. It only cost us 70 dollar! At Costco, they quoted us for almost $3000 to replace all tires. We will for sure go back to Canadian for future replacement!  We would 100% recommend this Canadian tire center at Cambie.

Great New Battery Warranty Experience...  After sitting for for sometime my 1974 Alfa GTV failed to start.  I lugged (yes - its heavy) my new Optima battery back to Canadian Tire on Cambie for testing and to find it unchargable.  30 minutes later the warranty papers are complete and I walk out with a brand new  battery. I chose to purchase here because of this exact confidence in the warranty system.  A 1965 Mini Cooper Woody owner was right behind me with the same issue. Great company, with car guys that love the older stuff, wanted to see pictures etc...
The only thing I didnt like about this location was the security gaurd. He regularly harassed people trying to leave, but hes been gone for at least a couple months, so, I have no complaints.
Had no trouble find a helpful staff to point out exactly what we needed. Parking is a breeze because of proximity to elevators and checkout.

I went in for a quick stop to purchase a Piler, I was pretty confused on which one to get and the staff member there was very helpful and knowledgeable and was able to help me find the one that I need. Great service

This review is for Booth in the auto dept. I came in about 30 mins before close because I had to get my car towed to the nearest auto shop. While the service department was already closed, Booth stopped what he was doing to immediately make sure the store would have my contact info and licence plate number. He took down all my details and told me to call him if I needed anything at all.  As someone who worked for two separate Canadian tires for about 3 years, Booth I appreciate you. Customer coming in frantically 30 mins before close? Likely underpaid/undervalued, and definitely overworked? Its tough, Ive been there but man did you make an already annoying situation for me just a little bit better. Thank you sir!
very convenient location! Just FYI they check your receipt at the door, like at Costco...I never expect this and always end up spending an embarrassing amount of time trying to fish out my receipt
I took my partners Jeep Wrangler in today for a minor issue and got incredible service. Super great communication and extremely fair prices. The intake person deserves a raise.

Thanks Canadian Tire for another great deal with our employees its was great meeting with the same people specially when we talk nice groups I love see that team again we have a lovely day!! - ALMASRI,0011

The best thing about this Canadian Tire is the camping scene with nature sounds as you go up the escalator to the second floor. Thats the only kind of camping I can get behind. This store is huge and had what I needed and Im sure what you need. Hate all the self checkouts though. Wish that wasnt a thing.
Thank you    Canadian tire . For the friendly , fast service  also reasonable prices . I usually always get everything I had on my list .

The selection of goodies is enough to overwhelm anyone, not that its a bad thing, I mean they have literally everything. Easy self checkout, even though I miss interacting with actual people but technology right? Also they have something to suit any budget, and I have never returned anything to Canadian Tire so kudos to them for that.

One of my favorite stores ever. No matter what you are looking for you can find it in Canadian Tire, sports, plumbing,  electrical,  consumables, gardening, house decorating, car features and maintenance, school, stools, tables, fireplaces! I bought mine there for black Friday and was a super good deal.
Had a great experience with  Booth  from the auto section. He was very kind, helpful and had a wealth of knowledge. Thanks again for all your help Booth!

I bought a cheap air conditioning and it turns out that its absolutely fabulous. Thank you Canadian Tire The air conditioning for $169.00 is fabulous works better than my old RCA It even has an air purifier in it and it works so great my apartment smells great

Favorite Store in this location! Amazing items ( especially Kitchen household items ). Love the Cat sections selections! Finally a place for more cat choices items. Love it! Great staff! Rosa Cashier was amazing services and friendly.
Good store, had lots of great appliances and tools, would come back again
A pretty good selection of outdoor . gear(camping,fishing,airsoft)
The staff at Canadian Tire Cambie street were extremely knowledgeable, helpful and kind. They made my experience great and efficient when I was very time pressured.
More than 100 aisles of stuff. Can cater to all your needs - tire to attire, from hair to toe. Whenever youre lost, ask a staff. They pull out a palmtop & are never wrong about their suggestions.
Purchased three DOT approved full face VCAN Rival helmets c/w visors for snowmobile and atv use. Good customer service at the Cambie @ 7th location in Vancouver.

I saw online that there was one remaining in store. I got there and ask the fellow if he could help me locate it. There was no more on shelf so he checked in warehouse and I got the last one...thanks for your over and above assistance...made me feel so happy as its gonna be a hot one this week
They have everything. Lots of sales. Located near the Canada Line subway.
The gentleman at the car service was very friendly with me and patient with a new employee being trained. I grabbed the parts I needed and I was in and out!
Great service as always! Check in is quick with online booking. Great team as well, handled my little Sypder very carefully. Thanks!
Recently we bought a bicycle. The staff were so pacient and helpful. I really appreciat them.
Garden staff were super helpful! Wide variety of plants and were able to provide some tips and tricks
Convenient location. So much selection like an old fashioned department store.

Great store!.  Clean, well organized and with PEOPLE! to whom you can ask questions and they are very polite.  Free parking as it gets refunded (if you purchase something) before you leave the store. One word: CIVILIZED!
Great experience with curbside pick up! Highly recommended! Ill definitely use this service more often.
a cactus that changes lives I keep it with me in my coat perfect for late night drives remember to take it with you on the boat
Its huge.  Lots of products.   Never had an issue with a return.
The place is really clean and organized. The attention is good and prices are accesibles. I love that you can get in with your pet.

This is a great store! Theyre busy changing things around right now and I couldnt find something I wanted, and the staff were so helpful and friendly. The garden centre Up on the Roof looks fairly decent and the prices werent that bad. My main thing to be grateful for was the vast amount of non LED lighting that they are still carrying at a reasonable price.

Very busy location. i had to call the store from inside the store to help me cut a key. Once I found someone, they were fast, efficient and extremely helpful. I loved their positive attitude, even though it was crazy busy. This shows professionalism. Please note: pay parking only

Very helpful staff member helped me get the correct battery for my car.  Also reminded me to return my old battery for a $20 core refund.  I ll be sure to return to this location. Also, their car battery price for my Jaguar was cheaper than anywhere else, even cheaper than Costco.

We had an amazing experience today at Canadian Tire Broadway! Our whole Christmas vacation was saved. After getting 2 tires slashed, and spending hours trying to get it sorted, staff member Genesis was extremely empathetic and showed real kindness. Great job Genesis and thank you !!! :)
One stop shop for a variety of products . Totally dependable and affordable products . My go to for sports good, hiking, kitchen goods,.......

This was my first time. Loved the  discounts, please be sure of what you want to buy before visiting. You can note down the product and aisle no in their app. Saves a lot of time. I would definitely recommend this store.

Old comment: Bought my snow tires here, then still charged me $300 for changing snow tires (put on rims and installation).   A friend working in Midas told me they charge $170 for the same service. Well, guess I should not trust this big brand at the first place. Won t go back again. (1 star review) New comment: Johnny who the manager made a reasonable explanation, so I am all good.  (Changed to 5 stars)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Colin, We suspect there may either be an error, or misunderstanding on your installation costs. When purchasing new tires from us, the install cost will range from $150 to $200 +tax,  depending on size. This seems to be in line with the cost mentioned at Midas. Please feel free to reach out to me so I can look into your recent visit with us. Thank you kindly! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Automotive Service Center 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: They had a washroom and the product I was looking for at what resembled market price.

Great customer service from the Automotive Service Department! Very polite and understanding, given I have been driving 12 hours straight. Gentleman named Genesis was very accomodating too(I parked my car in the 2nd floor parking area and he had someone move the car to the right area)and friendly. Overall a great experience
Hate shopping,but could be here for hrs... The one just over the Pitt bridge is 5x better
We found everything
Im always happy to bring my car in to this location. Even once when there was an issue they addressed it and fixed it right away!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Catherine, Thank you so much for the positive feedback on our shop! Your kindness is much appreciated and we value your business here. If you ever need anything more, please do not hesitate to reach out to me or my staff! Have a great weekend! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Incredibly helpful and friendly staff here. They really go out of their way to assist customers and make sure you are taken care of. Great experience each time!
IA super costumer service by Jack in bike service . Was wonderful thank you so much

boxing week of course it was a great deal, this is a good store for deals if you are patient. It doesnt hurt to have manners too, kindness, temperance, self-control. These are all required virtues if you want to shop in this store.
This store got everything from spice containers to car tools, adapters, plush toys, Halloween decorations, cooking ware, electronics but price is bit higher as compared to other stores.

This is the place. Not going anywhere but here to find detergent and other good deals. They also have a inclined escalator. Crazy stuff. Feel like I should apply just so I can keep tabs on gnar deals.

Been going to the Cambie location for Canadian tires for multiple years, and they do such an incredible job. My go to place if I need camping equipment or purchasing storage containers for my belongings. The staff is friendly and very accommodating.
Right before the heat wave hit I was able to get two ac units here when everywhere else was sold out.
Staff are always willing to help find the items that are needed. The store has a great layout and is very well stocked.

The Auto Center here has a really sound team- Communication between each other is top notch. Sal and his colleagues are very patient and incredibly friendly. I dropped my car off to get new tires and the turn around time was super fast. Highly recommend going here for your tire needs.
A1 auto shop that spotted a junk car I bought from a dodgy dealer and helped me get a full refund. Alex is the best, totally calm throughout, helped me with the process and saved me a lot of cash
Very good variety under one roof

Really enjoy the customer service here. Brought my dog to the store and was treated like a star. No issues whatsoever especially with the ongoing societal scamdemic policies in place that is ubiquitous. If youre looking for an item and need to help, customer service is friendly and available to assist you. They genuinely enjoy their jobs unlike other CT locations (Surrey) where bathroom availability and customer service is non-existent.
One stop shop for all your household needs.  They have very good COVID protocols in place.
The manager in fishing/outdoor is absolutely awesome. I walk in needing a complete fishing set up on 2 different occasions. He asked a few questions and built my set ups.

Huge selection of all sorts of outdoor stuff, automotive and housewares.  Very competitive sales and fun gizmos. This location was very busy because of the Christmas rush and they had loads of easy to find staff that knew where things were. Saved me lots of time and saved my Xmas since they were the only place in town that still had real cut Christmas trees available. They were blowing them out by the time I got there so I got a beautiful $99 tree for $30. The universe loves me :) The Canadian Tire money promos also save me lots of money. I like that I get points at Sportchek and Atmosphere that I can spend here. Excellent value. Ill be back

This is a large Canadian Tire and I have to say that I have received some of the best customer service at this specific location. Each staff member I have dealt with was extremely helpful and friendly. During one of my visits I was doing a self check out and to my surprise one of the staff created a handle for my bag because I had an awkward and oversized item. It was so thoughtful. A positive customer experience can make or break a shopping trip and I go out of my way to shop here because of the phenomenal service. Keep up the great work!! ***IF YOU FOUND THIS REVIEW HELPFUL KINDLY  LIKE  IT***
Always a pleasure  to shop at Canada Tire. Except  crippy Cambie  location with  pay parking on top  of it S hitt hole.

This review is for the automotive garage only - I do not have any experience shopping here otherwise. I had quite the experience here over the past month, which started from me trying to simply get my seasonal tire change done. A lot went wrong, but, each time, the service advisors were extremely helpful in explaining why and how, and doing their best to make it right. Which they did. Due strictly to their fantastic service (specifically, Laura and Daniel, A+), this shop gets a no-questions 5/5. Good customer service is the single most important aspect of a successful business, in my opinion, and here it was knocked out of the park. If things go wrong and time is lost to visits where nothing gets done, a good service advisor can make all the difference. When the job finally got done, it got done right, so no issues there. It ended up with me buying a new set of tires and the aligning/balancing that goes with that. The tires are on, the wheels are aligned and balanced, and nothing feels off.

It is centrally located and yet, they have a very big inventory and space. They even have plastic kayaks on stock, when other Canadian Tire locations dont. Awesome, beautiful, clean store. Their credit card is of all my cards, my favourite!
Had good experience in canadian tire. Staff was helpful all the time.

Any Concerns or product inquiries go ASK FOR BROCK. Superior Excellence in Customer Satisfaction n Experience. Just ask for Him. Fantastic Listener n has Solutions for all your Needs. Superior Friendly and easy to talk to. Many Thanks Brock for your Kindness and Helpfulness on the Spot.

Staff were friendly and had approachable attitudes. Got there at the last minutes before closing, but rather than bother my unsure choice of products, they were patient enough to let me make my decisions and pay for them at the till!

Everything i need. I realy like this canadian tire because the staff has allways been good and the big security gaurd at exit watchs my bike for me  well i shop. I would say thats cool to do that he lets me bring it in and put it beside him and he is a very nice guy. I wanted to give him a tip but he said he is not allowed to except tips so he is very kind. Keep up the good work. I like to see people around that treat me like a human being and the staff at this canadian tire all have been very good to me. Thank you
Customer service desk always super friendly and efficient!!
Helped my to exchange my old battery. Nice people!

Brought my car into the service centre to replace my tires. Had an overall great experience with their service advisor Alex. Ended up doing a whole bunch of work done to my car because my interaction was so pleasant. Will definitely come back. BTW their tire warranty is a great deal would recommend to everyone who suffer from random nails and debris always getting in their tires

Very convenient location, staff are helpful and knowledgeable even if you asked items out of their department theyll tell you where to find items. So people please ask and be nice to staff because theyre working really hard!

This has got to be one of the easiest stores to find things you need.  Last year I got my Christmas decorations from here and my tree still looks amazing this year!  Also, I always spend too much time in their housewares department, they have all of the great kitchen stuff at great prices and wonderful sales.  Their staff are very helpful and its such a nice clean store with great hours to shop at!  In addition, they are excellent community partners, and have participated in community events! THANK YOU!!!

Gee! Such a huge store that took me sometime to find what I intend to buy.  On the other hand, was happy to buy the flowering plants I have seen for the first time  in my life, so unique and colorful! Beautiful plants!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Melodina, were happy to hear you found everything you needed. Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I recommend the bike shop here and kudo to Bahsa who is bike shop manager. He is very kind and also professional! I bought my bike a few days ago and he gave me a great service. I am very satisified with him. I also visited the bike shop in Richmond but this place has more bikes too.
The only place I could find reasonabke priced tire for my car

I always enjoy going to Canadian Tire. Even though the store is large it has a good use of floor space. They have everything you could possibly want for your home and automotive needs. They are usually well stocked and they do give out raincheques when they have to. The staff are helpful and friendly and make my visit pleasant. I highly recommend this business.
Great customer service and great price for everything!

What do you know about Canadian Tire. It has a lot of stuff. And good prices, quality varies, but you know what youre getting into.  I found what I wanted on line, went to the store, found it and got out of there.  So, its efficient now to shop there as the online version tells you which store has what or if it is in stock.  If you want to wander, theres plenty to see ... And this Canadian tire has auto repair shop, crazy expensive parking in the area. I parked 2 blocks away and walked there. They have good plant sales in the summer, too.

I called this afternoon with an urgent issue and Genesis was able to fit me in with Robbie, the shop foreman. He was able to diagnose and repair the issue last minute. Im so grateful for the help, absolutely above and beyond service at this location.   Thank you guys so much for helping me out, I appreciate it more than you could know.  Anxiety attack avoided!   Thank you so much!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Elicia! We thank you so much for your kind words and positive review! However youve left your review on the retail side of our business. If you wouldnt mind taking a minute of your time to transfer your review to our service center, we would very much appreciate the support! You can find the link below. https://g.page/r/CVVGZCa4SxpCEAE Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: I really enjoy shopping at Cdn Tire n I usually go to the one nearest to me on Cambie and 7th Ave. Today was one where I had a great experience with one particular staff working in the plants section upstairs. I usually like to look over the discount plant shelf to see if theres anything there that Im care to try to rescue. I ended up picking up two plants (one 5 cm & 10 cm) n the bigger one was almost dried out. I decided to dunk it in a large container nearby that was filled with water n it had a watering can. After I was done n was trying to get out of the closely packed area, a staff member noticed that I picked up some discount plants n complimented me on trying to rescue some of them. After a short conversation, she ended up offering me two of the small 5 cm plants for free as her Xmas gift to me as it was clear that it easily made me happy. Her name was Pat n she said that why not make someone happy if its easy for her to do so n wished me Merry Xmas. I was very pleased with her kindness and wished her the same. TYVM again Pat giving me such a great experience. One more thing, I dont really enjoy being made to use the self check out machines n sincerely wish that theres an option to purchase products from a humin cashier. So many issues come up with using these machines and I dont enjoy the experience. Thats it. Thanks again, Pat!!

No matter which Canadian Tire I go to, I always walk out knowing theres more I want to run back into the store and buy. I stopped by the Cambie store because (1) I happened to be in the area during the boxing week promotions and (2) I saw that this location carried a bunch of items that my local branch was out of. I liked what I saw in the store: good deals & good selection. I dont know if it is my favourite layout but I found my way around.

I went to get helium balloons and party supplies at the Party City pop-up area inside of the Canadian Tire and Jessica was really amazing. She was very friendly and gave me really good tips on how to keep the balloons safe while transporting them. I will definitely come back!

I was looking for a garden hose nozzle and I got one at $7.99. Its the certified metal rear-trigger pistol. It can do some spray painting but Ill try it as is. Reviews on Canadian Tire app says its pretty good compared to more expensive ones including the plastic options. The Canadian Tire employees were very helpful too. I asked three employees for directions since its my first time in this branch and I was wheeling a very cranky taby (toddler baby). If you want to the garden centre, the entrance is the one adjacent to Cambie, not the Cambie one. I repeat not the entrance on Cambie street. Its especially helpful to know this when you also have a stroller or on a wheelchair and going up to  the garden centre. I wanted to buy other things such as veggie seedlings on sale but it was almost impossible with a wailing kid in tow.
Beautiful decoration, good store

Love this store. Huge selection of outdoor / sports equipments, half a floor of gardening, and one full floor of appliances and kitchen necessities. Make sure you take your parking recipt to the cashier for a validation! We did not know they do so for a while.
Alex has best customer service!
Picked up Dog/Coyote Repellent less than $20 tax included, in & out in less than 10 minutes.

Ive been here dozens of times and Ive bought everything from bikes to seeds to screws to kitchen utensils. Staff is helpful and knowledgeable and I see the same faces quite a bit so the turnover must be lower than at other stores, which is encouraging. True you have to pay for parking, but if you buy over $15 worth of goods you get reimbursed. Great selection; I have never failed to find what I came for. Bag policy: free, as needed.

I ve gone here a few times. Got a helmet, a bike and last purchase was a wok. Yesterday I was looking into a coffee machine and a staff member noticed and asked if I needed help. I find staff is attentive and doing the best they can during this situation we re all in.
Great super shop does have every thing you need for you home, gardening and technical activities. Its staff are helpful and their prices are reasonable. It has its own parking place.

I have been (casually) looking for a drill for about 2 years. The other day I bought what I thought was a drill, but wasnt... I just returned it and took a look at the isle with drills, to try to catch what I missed. A Canadian Tire associate named *MAGGIE* came to assist me. Though she didnt laugh at me (thank you), she did give me a ton of - easy to understand - info on drills, and even took the time to go over pricing with me, even after I said I wasnt going to buy today. You folks have a blazing gold star with this associate, please give her all the kudos/stars/BONUSES/prize. Maggie is the reason I will get this item from Canadian Tire (instead of Amazon or Wal-Mart). Thanks again!!!
Ample parking.  Friendly service.
